Articles.Content:
Anyone here heard of MyMiniCity? It\'s a browser-based flash game where once a day you visit your city to increase it\'s population by one. For example, here\'s my current city village hamlet house. [http://tanershon.myminicity.com](http://tanershon.myminicity.com) When I visit tomorrow a new house grows as I made the town today. :3c

Each IP gets to either increase the population, industry, transport, safety, environment or business. Population is just cityname.myminicity.com .com/ind for industry, /tra for transport, etc. The city needs certain population levels to unlock industry and so on.

I\'d appreciate it if y\'all clicked on mah city. :3c

[http://tanershon.myminicity.com](http://tanershon.myminicity.com) --- Luigibro606\'s city

[http://jebtopia.myminicity.com/](http://jebtopia.myminicity.com/) --- Jeb\_Kerman\'s city

Needs moar SPESS MAHREENS

\'Kay, I\'ll check it out.

EDIT: That\'s a very nice house you have there...

Thanks.

:3c

Soon the city will be more than a collection of houses.
Oh yes, i am losing count on these \'\'visit my stuff\'\' sites. That used to get banhammered where i came from, so i won\'t suggest starting it up here, just in case it becomes a rule.
I don\'t see it as much of a problem as long as its just in a thread...(And it isn\'t massively spammed...)

Sorry, per the following rule...

[mod]Section 8: Miscellaneous Issues

A user shall not: At any time advertise an off forum feature, service, or society- incentive does not matter.[/mod]

If we allowed this then we\'d have tons of people posting links to traffic generators.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
